title: Camera Preset
description: A camera preset is a set of values that define a camera's position and rotation. This can be used to quickly set a camera to a specific position and rotation.

identifier.description: The identifier of the camera preset. This is used to reference the camera preset in other components.

inherit_from.description: The identifier of the camera preset to inherit from. This will copy the values from the inherited camera preset and then apply the values from this camera preset.

player_effects.description: If true, the camera will apply player effects such as nausea and blindness.

listener.description: Specifies what / who acts as the ears for the camera.

pos_x.description: The x position of the camera.

pos_y.description: The y position of the camera.

pos_z.description: The z position of the camera.

rot_x.description: The pitch of the camera. positive values look down, negative values look up.

rot_y.description: The yaw of the camera. This is the direction the camera is facing.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
